attributes.action: Launch an inquiry into why and how we can prevent men committing suicide.
attributes.additional_details:
More information can be find on The Book of Man's website.
More information can be found here: https://www.mentalhealth.org.uk/a-to-z/m/men-and-mental-health
More information regarding Movember can be located here: https://uk.movember.com/mens-health/mental-health
Information from Mind can be found here: https://www.mind.org.uk/information-support/your-stories/man-up-getting-more-men-in-mental-health/#.XT_vVlPTUwA
Men's Health has a good article: https://www.menshealth.com/health/a20111514/men-mental-health-awareness-month/
attributes.background: It is unfortunate but more and more men are facing mental health issues and being told to "man up" or "grow a pair". There is a stigma associated with men being able to talk about their feelings and I find that the government is doing little in preventing this national crisis.
